Question: Shenzhen Earfun Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
EarFun Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Wave Pro Over-Ear Headphones

- Hybrid active noise cancellation (ANC)
- Hi-res audio capability with LDAC Bluetooth codec
- Bluetooth Multipoint
- 40mm DLC composite film dynamic coil drivers
- Five built-in mics for calls
- 80-hour battery life
- Fast charging with 10-minute charge providing 10 hours of playback
- Lightweight and comfortable design
- Dedicated Game Mode with low-latency (<55ms)
- Voice assistant support
- Price: $79.99

Product: UBOOM X Portable Bluetooth Speaker

- 80 watts of power with four drivers
- JumboBass™ technology for well-defined bass
- SweatShield™ and IPX7 waterproofing
- Synchronize with up to 50 other UBOOM X speakers
- Dynamic LED lighting with customization
- Playback up to 30 hours
- USB-C quick charging
- Integrated carrying handle and strap
- Bluetooth 5.3 with ultra-low latency
- Support for Google Assist and Siri voice assistants
- Price: $179.99

EarFun unveiled these products at CES 2024, with the Wave Pro set to launch in March and the UBOOM X in June.
Summary_cn:
EarFun Technology有限公司。

产品：Wave Pro头戴式耳机

- 混合主动降噪（ANC）
- 具备LDAC蓝牙编解码器的高解析音频能力
- 蓝牙多连接
- 40毫米DLC复合薄膜动圈驱动器
- 五个内置麦克风用于通话
- 80小时电池续航
- 10分钟快速充电，可提供10小时播放时间
- 轻巧且舒适的设计
- 专用游戏模式，低延迟（<55毫秒）
- 语音助手支持
- 价格：$79.99

产品：UBOOM X便携式蓝牙音箱

- 四个驱动器，总功率80瓦
- JumboBass™技术，提供清晰的低音
- SweatShield™ 和IPX7防水
- 最多可与其他50个UBOOM X音箱同步
- 动态LED灯光，可定制
- 最长30小时播放时间
- USB-C快速充电
- 集成提手和肩带
- Bluetooth 5.3，超低延迟
- 支持谷歌助理和Siri语音助手
- 价格：$179.99

EarFun在2024年的CES上发布了这些产品，Wave Pro将于3月推出，UBOOM X将于6月推出。
